item.description:
Tour of the New MFA Wing
6:30 â€” 9 pm
Wednesday, June 9, 2010
Sharf Visitor Center

Come and we'll visit the new wing with its 50 new galleries. I took a brief visit and it is truly spectacular. It might be a little crowded, but the purpose will be get a feel of the new wing and what it has to offer. The MFA Cafeteria is now open till 8, so we'll go there first and get some energy before we start touring. Hope you can make it.


Wed. nights is "pay what you can". $5 is suggested. About this Meetup Group
Museum of FIne Arts, Boston
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me in the Visitor Center. I'll have an orange shirt.
item.name: MFA - Tour the New MFA Wing
